Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのシャオルーンって聖獣、 今までの聖獣とちょっと違う感じだったよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune seemed different from the other Sacred Beasts we've met so far, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。よくしゃべるっていうか、 軽いっていうか……聖獣っぽくなかったわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, he's talkative and more casual... He doesn't seem like a Sacred Beast.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣にも<Eugene>みたいなのがいれば、 <Tytree>みたいなのもいるってコトだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well if there're Sacred Beasts that are like <Eugene>, then there are gonna be some who are like <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね、そうかもしれないわね。
……コラ、<Annie>！ そこで同意すんなっつーの！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Annie>! Don't agree with him on that!
